text:
Hi,
After an *custom Workflow action* is created is there a way to update/ PATCH  the *PRE_ACTION_EXECUTION*  function source JSON payload ?

here basically I want to modify  `body: JSON.stringify({value:request.inputFields.Text_Input, portalId : request.origin.portalId} })`
``` {
    "functionType": "PRE_ACTION_EXECUTION",
     "functionSource": "exports.main = function(event, callback) { return callback(transformRequest(event)); }\nfunction transformRequest(request) { return { webhookUrl: '<https://app.dataformatter.my.id/format/text_to_number>', body: JSON.stringify({value:request.inputFields.Text_Input}), contentType: 'application/json', accept: 'application/json', httpMethod: 'POST' }; }"
 }```
is this possible ?

Looking for a custom code for the workflow, to copy existing line items from a deal, to all associated deals.
does anyone have a reference?
Did something change today with the `<https://api.HubSpot.com/automation/v4/actions/callbacks/complete>` endpoint for custom workflow actions? I've been getting 400 errors for many hours now.
make that since yesterday around midnight pacific time
